ideas.title: Empty News Stand
ideas.premise: A weather-beaten newsstand is surrounded by tumbleweeds, the vendor wearing a 'Gone Fishing' sign, because nothing happened today.
ideas.why_funny: The absurdity of *literally* nothing happening, personified by a derelict Melbourne institution.

ideas.title: Myki Moment
ideas.premise: Two trams collide because both drivers were too busy topping up their Myki cards mid-route.
ideas.why_funny: Relatable frustration with the Myki system leading to chaotic results.

ideas.title: Seagull Summit
ideas.premise: Seagulls hold an emergency press conference complaining about the lack of dropped chips at Flinders Street Station.
ideas.why_funny: Anthropomorphising the aggressive seagulls and their dependence on human carelessness.

ideas.title: Hook Turn Confusion
ideas.premise: A driving instructor screams in frustration as a self-driving car attempts a hook turn perfectly.
ideas.why_funny: Ironic twist on frustrating Melbourne driving quirks, juxtaposed with advanced tech.

ideas.title: Coffee Crisis Averted
ideas.premise: The City Council declares a state of emergency when a coffee bean shipment is delayed, quickly rescinded when it arrives.
ideas.why_funny: Exaggerated importance of coffee in Melbourne's culture and bureaucracy's dramatic response.
